txt.en: You worthless wretch! Your defeat earns only failure!
You have been ushered out on a simple scouting mission to find the central keep called Tol Ascarnen.

'You're an ambitious one, [placeholder]. Very well then, I've a simple enough task for you. Simple indeed.\n\n'Make your way east towards the Hoardale River. Find the island in the centre...just scout it out and have a look through Tol Ascarnen! If you survive, come back to me.'
Tol Ascarnen is on an island in the Hoardale River, east of Gramsfoot.\n\nYou were ordered to find and scout out Tol Ascarnen.
'I had expected you sooner, maggot. You found it, though, and this means you survived! You might not be as worthless as I assumed!'
Soldier Nartul awaits your return at Gramsfoot.\n\nYou discovered and scouted the area around Tol Ascarnen.
'Still here. Perhaps I was right, and you are a coward. Tol Ascarnen, worm. Go there now, or I will bury my blade in your belly and spill your innards on this ground!'
Return to Soldier Nartul at Gramsfoot
